title: 7.3.2 Implement Cost Explorer integration
body:
## Parent Issue
#31 - 7.3 Cost Analysis Scanner

## Objective
Integrate with AWS Cost Explorer API for spend analysis.

## Features
- Get last 30 days spend
- Breakdown by service
- Calculate spend trend vs previous period

## Files to Create
- `src/cloud_optimizer/scanners/cost/spend_analyzer.py`

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Query Cost Explorer API
- [ ] Parse spend by service
- [ ] Calculate trend percentage

## Estimated Time: 2.5 hours
